Supportive care 
/circle6 Encourage and re-assure the woman that things are going well.
/circle6 Maintain and respect the privacy of the woman during examination and discussion.
/circle6 Explain all examinations and procedures to be carried out on the woman, seek her 
p
ermission before conducting them and discuss the fi ndings with her.
/circle6 Encourage the woman to bath or wash herself and her genitals at the onset of labour.
